export const quiz2 = {
  "quizTitle": "Section 2: Sights, Barrels, and Mags",
  "quizSynopsis": "You gotta be a real Destiny nerd to know these.",
  "appLocale": {
    "landingHeaderText": "<questionLength> (Harder) Perks",

    "pickNumberOfSelection": "Choose <numberOfSelection>"
  },
  "questions": [{
    "answers": ["Accurized Rounds", "Rangefinder", "Ambitious Assassin", "High-Velocity Rounds"],
    "questionType": "text",
    "question": "What perk is this?",
    "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/b/b3/Accurized_rounds_icon1.png",
    "correctAnswer": "1",
    "messageForCorrectAnswer": "Just making sure we know our basics. I promise it'll get challenging.",
    "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "Uh oh, that one shouldn't have been too difficult. It's only gonna get harder from here.",

    "segment": "Easy",

  }, {
    "question": "What perk is this?",
    "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/1/1d/Drop_mag_icon1.png",
    "questionType": "text",
    "answers": ["Alloy Magazine", "Flared Magwell", "Drop Mag", "Swap Mag"],
    "correctAnswer": "3",
    "messageForCorrectAnswer": "Piece of cake. Let's keep going.",
    "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "Magazines are tricky. Let's get the next one.",
    "explanation": "Drop Mag: Magazine drops on reload, wasting ammunition but greatly increasing reload speed. (Reload Speed +30)",
    "segment": "Easy",
    "segment2": "5 Points",
    "point": "5"
  }, {
    "question": "What perk is this?",
    "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/f/f7/Full_choke_icon1.png",
    "questionType": "text",
    "answers": ["Full Bore", "Barrel Shroud", "Full Choke", "Rifled Barrel"],
    "correctAnswer": "3",
    "messageForCorrectAnswer": "ooga booga cryoclasm shotguns.  APES TOGETHER STRONG!",
    "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "So you're not a shotgun ape. Let me thank you personally, good friend.",
    "explanation": "Full Choke: Tightened barrel. Reduces projectile spread when aiming down sights at the cost of precision damage.",
    "segment": "Easy",
    "segment2": "5 Points",
    "point": "5"
  }, {
    "question": "What perk is this?",
    "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/6/64/Appended_mag_icon1.png",
    "questionType": "text",
    "answers": ["Appended Mag", "Light Mag", "Assault Mag", "Tactical Mag"],
    "correctAnswer": "1",
    "messageForCorrectAnswer": "Nicely done! A lot of people have stumbled on this one, let me tell you.",
    "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "Yeah, this one was a little harder - don't worry, lots of people stumbled here.",
    "explanation": "Appended Mag: This weapon's magazine is built for higher capacity. Increases magazine size.",
    "segment": "Medium",
    "segment2": "10 Points",
    "point": "10"
  }, {
    "question": "What perk is this?",
    "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/3/3e/Chambered_compensator_icon1.png",
    "questionType": "text",
    "answers": ["Fluted Barrel", "Chambered Compensator", "Arrowhead Brake", "Full Bore"],
    "correctAnswer": "2",
    "messageForCorrectAnswer": "Alright, okay, I see you. You get one more freebie before we ramp it up.",
    "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "Yep - I feel the same. Why do all these barrels look so similar?",
    "explanation": "Chambered Compensator: Stable barrel attachment. Increases stability. Improves recoil direction. Slightly decreases handling speed.",
    "segment": "Medium",
    "segment2": "10 Points",
    "point": "10"
  }, {
    "question": "Which weapon type does this sight belong to?",
    "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/9/98/Crossfire_hcs_icon1.png",
    "questionType": "text",
    "answers": ["Hand Cannon", "Pulse Rifle", "Auto Rifle", "Fusion Rifle"],
    "correctAnswer": "1",
    "messageForCorrectAnswer": "Last free points. This is where it gets challenging.",
    "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "Sights? Scopes? Does anyone actually look at those?",
    "explanation": "Hand Cannon: Did you know, all hand cannon sights share the same icon! (With one or two exceptions)",
    "segment": "Medium",
    "segment2": "10 Points",
    "point": "10"
  }, {
    "question": "What perk is this?",
    "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/0/06/Ionized_battery_icon1.png",

    "correctAnswer": "3",
    "messageForCorrectAnswer": "My god, do you actually use fusion rifles? Or was that a guess?",
    "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "Yeah, I don't use fusion rifles either. Don't worry - means you're a normal person.",
    "explanation": "Ionized Battery: Large heavy battery. Greatly increases magazine size. Greatly decreases reload speed.",
    "segment": "Advanced",
    "segment2": "20 Points",
    "point": "20"
  }, {
    "question": "What perk is this?",

    "correctAnswer": "1",
    "messageForCorrectAnswer": "Wow, nice one. At this point, it's just a game of luck for me.",
    "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "Let me just say, this quiz is supposed to be hard. Wouldn't be fun if everything was easy!",

    "segment": "Advanced",
    "segment2": "20 Points",
    "point": "20"
  }, {
    "question": "What perk is this?",
    "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/0/01/Quick_launch_icon1.png",
    "questionType": "text",
    "answers": ["Hard Launch", "Quick Launch", "Volatile Launch", "Confined Launch"],
    "correctAnswer": "2",
    "messageForCorrectAnswer": "Damn, you're a beast. Are you an OG player from Y1?",
    "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "Nobody uses rocket launchers either. I don't blame you.",
    "explanation": "Quick Launch: This weapon's barrel provides faster projectiles and much faster aiming. Greatly increases handling speed. Increases projectile speed.",
    "segment": "Advanced",
    "segment2": "20 Points",
    "point": "20"
  }]
};
export default quiz2;

sourcesContent:
export const quiz2 =  {
  "quizTitle": "Section 2: Sights, Barrels, and Mags",
  "quizSynopsis": "You gotta be a real Destiny nerd to know these.",

  "appLocale": {
    "landingHeaderText": "<questionLength> (Harder) Perks",
    "question": "Perk",
    "startQuizBtn": "Bring it on!",
    "resultFilterAll": "All",
    "resultFilterCorrect": "Correct",
    "resultFilterIncorrect": "Incorrect",
    "nextQuestionBtn": "Next",
    "resultPageHeaderText": "You have completed this section. You got <correctIndexLength> out of <questionLength> questions.",
    "singleSelectionTagText": "Section 2",
    "pickNumberOfSelection": "Choose <numberOfSelection>",
  },

  "questions": [
    {
      "answers": [
        "Accurized Rounds",
        "Rangefinder",
        "Ambitious Assassin",
        "High-Velocity Rounds"
      ],
      "questionType": "text",
      "question": "What perk is this?",
      "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/b/b3/Accurized_rounds_icon1.png",
      "correctAnswer": "1",
      "messageForCorrectAnswer": "Just making sure we know our basics. I promise it'll get challenging.",
      "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "Uh oh, that one shouldn't have been too difficult. It's only gonna get harder from here.",
      "explanation": "Accurized Rounds: This weapon can fire long distances. (Range +10)",
      "segment": "Easy",
      "segment2": "5 Points",
      "point": "5",
    },
    {
      "question": "What perk is this?",
      "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/1/1d/Drop_mag_icon1.png",
      "questionType": "text",
      "answers": [
        "Alloy Magazine",
        "Flared Magwell",
        "Drop Mag",
        "Swap Mag"
      ],
      "correctAnswer": "3",
      "messageForCorrectAnswer": "Piece of cake. Let's keep going.",
      "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "Magazines are tricky. Let's get the next one.",
      "explanation": "Drop Mag: Magazine drops on reload, wasting ammunition but greatly increasing reload speed. (Reload Speed +30)",
      "segment": "Easy",
      "segment2": "5 Points",
      "point": "5",
    },
    {
      "question": "What perk is this?",
      "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/f/f7/Full_choke_icon1.png",
      "questionType": "text",
      "answers": [
        "Full Bore",
        "Barrel Shroud",
        "Full Choke",
        "Rifled Barrel"
      ],
      "correctAnswer": "3",
      "messageForCorrectAnswer": "ooga booga cryoclasm shotguns.  APES TOGETHER STRONG!",
      "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "So you're not a shotgun ape. Let me thank you personally, good friend.",
      "explanation": "Full Choke: Tightened barrel. Reduces projectile spread when aiming down sights at the cost of precision damage.",
      "segment": "Easy",
      "segment2": "5 Points",
      "point": "5",
    },
    {
      "question": "What perk is this?",
      "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/6/64/Appended_mag_icon1.png",
      "questionType": "text",
      "answers": [
        "Appended Mag",
        "Light Mag",
        "Assault Mag",
        "Tactical Mag"
      ],
      "correctAnswer": "1",
      "messageForCorrectAnswer": "Nicely done! A lot of people have stumbled on this one, let me tell you.",
      "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "Yeah, this one was a little harder - don't worry, lots of people stumbled here.",
      "explanation": "Appended Mag: This weapon's magazine is built for higher capacity. Increases magazine size.",
      "segment": "Medium",
      "segment2": "10 Points",
      "point": "10",
    },
    {
      "question": "What perk is this?",
      "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/3/3e/Chambered_compensator_icon1.png",
      "questionType": "text",
      "answers": [
        "Fluted Barrel",
        "Chambered Compensator",
        "Arrowhead Brake",
        "Full Bore"
      ],
      "correctAnswer": "2",
      "messageForCorrectAnswer": "Alright, okay, I see you. You get one more freebie before we ramp it up.",
      "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "Yep - I feel the same. Why do all these barrels look so similar?",
      "explanation": "Chambered Compensator: Stable barrel attachment. Increases stability. Improves recoil direction. Slightly decreases handling speed.",
      "segment": "Medium",
      "segment2": "10 Points",
      "point": "10",
    },
    {
      "question": "Which weapon type does this sight belong to?",
      "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/9/98/Crossfire_hcs_icon1.png",
      "questionType": "text",
      "answers": [
        "Hand Cannon",
        "Pulse Rifle",
        "Auto Rifle",
        "Fusion Rifle"
      ],
      "correctAnswer": "1",
      "messageForCorrectAnswer": "Last free points. This is where it gets challenging.",
      "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "Sights? Scopes? Does anyone actually look at those?",
      "explanation": "Hand Cannon: Did you know, all hand cannon sights share the same icon! (With one or two exceptions)",
      "segment": "Medium",
      "segment2": "10 Points",
      "point": "10",
    },
    {
      "question": "What perk is this?",
      "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/0/06/Ionized_battery_icon1.png",
      "questionType": "text",
      "answers": [
        "Accelerated Coils",
        "Projection Fuse",
        "Ionized Battery",
        "Enhanced Battery"
      ],
      "correctAnswer": "3",
      "messageForCorrectAnswer": "My god, do you actually use fusion rifles? Or was that a guess?",
      "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "Yeah, I don't use fusion rifles either. Don't worry - means you're a normal person.",
      "explanation": "Ionized Battery: Large heavy battery. Greatly increases magazine size. Greatly decreases reload speed.",
      "segment": "Advanced",
      "segment2": "20 Points",
      "point": "20",
    },
    {
      "question": "What perk is this?",
      "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/4/4c/Thermoplastic_grenades_icon1.png",
      "questionType": "text",
      "answers": [
        "Thermoplastic Grenades",
        "Remote Detonation",
        "Mini Frags",
        "Black Powder"
      ],
      "correctAnswer": "1",
      "messageForCorrectAnswer": "Wow, nice one. At this point, it's just a game of luck for me.",
      "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "Let me just say, this quiz is supposed to be hard. Wouldn't be fun if everything was easy!",
      "explanation": "Thermoplastic Grenades: Grenades fired from this weapon bounce further. Increases stability. Increases projectile speed.",
      "segment": "Advanced",
      "segment2": "20 Points",
      "point": "20",
    },
    {
      "question": "What perk is this?",
      "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/0/01/Quick_launch_icon1.png",
      "questionType": "text",
      "answers": [
        "Hard Launch",
        "Quick Launch",
        "Volatile Launch",
        "Confined Launch"
      ],
      "correctAnswer": "2",
      "messageForCorrectAnswer": "Damn, you're a beast. Are you an OG player from Y1?",
      "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "Nobody uses rocket launchers either. I don't blame you.",
      "explanation": "Quick Launch: This weapon's barrel provides faster projectiles and much faster aiming. Greatly increases handling speed. Increases projectile speed.",
      "segment": "Advanced",
      "segment2": "20 Points",
      "point": "20",
    }
  ]
}

export default quiz2;
